questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with our product quality?
How would you rate our customer service?
How likely are you to recommend us to others?
questions.help_text: 1 = Not likely at all, 10 = Extremely likely

interpretations.title: Poor Satisfaction
interpretations.description: Your experience indicates significant areas that need immediate attention. We value your feedback and want to make things right.
recommendations: Contact our customer service team for immediate assistance
Consider trying our premium support option
We'll follow up personally to address your concerns

interpretations.title: Fair Satisfaction
interpretations.description: You're having an okay experience, but we know we can do better. There's definitely room for improvement.
recommendations: Check out our help center for tips and tricks
Consider upgrading to get access to more features
Share specific feedback to help us improve

interpretations.title: Good Satisfaction
interpretations.description: Great! You're having a positive experience with us. We're meeting your expectations and you're generally satisfied.
recommendations: Explore advanced features you might not know about
Join our community to connect with other users
Consider leaving a review to help others

interpretations.title: Excellent Satisfaction
interpretations.description: Outstanding! You're having an exceptional experience. We're exceeding your expectations and you're our biggest advocate.
recommendations: Share your success story with our community
Refer friends and family to earn rewards

scoring.description: Sum of weighted scores: Product Quality (weight 2) + Service (weight 1.5) + Recommendation (weight 1)
